description: This project aims to support the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation and concerned institutions- to establish a coordinated treaty body reporting mechanism and implement activities related to monitoring and reporting of international treaties.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description: This project aims to support the Government of Rwanda - particularly the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation and other concerned ministries and institutions- to establish a coordinated treaty body reporting mechanism and implement activities related to monitoring and reporting on international treaties.
subproject.title: Monit.&Impl Treaty Body Report
